DOC.brief_summary: Optical coherence tomography is technology widely used in medicine. In this study, the investigators will use an optical tomographic scanner to scan skin tissue image.
DOC.brief_title: Optical Tomographic Scanner for Skin Lesions
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators will use optical tomographic scanner to scan skin specimen and obtain tissue images. Part of skin specimen obtained from skin biopsy or surgery will be scanned.
DOC.criteria: Patient who receive skin biopsy or surgery due to skin cancers, benign skin diseases, or inflammatory skin diseases.
